tidbits.title: Art and Culture Hub
tidbits.description: France is an art and culture hub, known for its iconic landmarks like the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, rich history in literature, art, and culinary excellence.

tidbits.title: Diverse Landscapes
tidbits.description: The country offers diverse landscapes, from the romantic countryside of Provence to the stunning French Riviera and the majestic Alps in the east.

tidbits.title: Culinary Delights
tidbits.description: France is celebrated for its gastronomy, with world-renowned cuisine, fine wines, exquisite pastries, and a culture that reveres food and dining experiences.
